value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|You know what time it is... The
people's wishes have once again
called forth Brave Heroes!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Our advance report suggests that
these Brave Heroes have strong
bonds with their predecessors.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I can't wait! Let's go and greet them!$k$p

$WmMPID_総選挙アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_ELECTION01,Face|Hmm. This monument...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_ELECTION01,Face|It looks like it's been here for quite
a while. And these inscriptions...
they're names, aren't they?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_ELECTION01,Face|Look! There's mine.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_ELECTION01,Face|Mine as well... At a guess, this is
a list of all of those who have been
summoned as Brave Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_ELECTION01,Face|Many have preceded us, I see.$k$pThat's Celica's name! So she was
called here too...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_ELECTION01,Face|Hector, Lyn, and Roy as well... Aha.
I think I understand why I am here.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_ELECTION01,Face|You do?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_ELECTION01,Face|Heroes, borne here on the wishes of
the people... A desire so strong as to
call us here.$k$pAs our comrades were summoned
before us, now it is our turn to
answer the call.$k$pThat's how I see it, anyway.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_総選挙エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_ELECTION01,Face|This is as far as we go now. Let's
retreat.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_ELECTION01,Face|As you say. We must prepare for
the next battle.$k$p$Sbs150|
